Posts.Content: Hello everyone! I am new here and came to this community to find help for my dear daughter Irina. We are war refuges at Ukraine, and my daughter was diagnosis with breast cancer about two month ago. That is a big grief for us, especially now, while we have hard times in our country. Valusha, (Irina's mother).
Posts.Title: Hello, please help my dougter!

Posts.Content: Hello Kath, Thank you for understandng.. you know it's really hard, hospital did not  take  my daughter because we a refugies from another state, and when we asked state services for finansial help for medications, the refuse request.. that is terribble. My daughter dieing  right  before my eyes and I cannot do anthing.. We have no insurance in our country so threatment and medications is very expencive and my pension is only 90 USD$.
Posts.Title: Hello, please help my dougter!

Posts.Content: Each day I cry.. Such a terrible desease.. Now doctor said she suffering from non-glandular anemia. We live in a small town where there is no even blood transfusion in local hospital..I always pray to God to save her..
Posts.Title: Hello, please help my dougter!
